specialAbilities.name: Dark Devotion
specialAbilities.description: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

specialAbilities.name: Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
